docs.snippet: While leaning over a cooking stove in her apartments at 409 Hadson Street yesterday afternoon, Mrs. Harriet Bennett was severely burned about the face and body through her clothes catching fire. She was taken to St. Vincent's Hospital. It is belie...
docs.lead_paragraph: While leaning over a cooking stove in her apartments at 409 Hadson Street yesterday afternoon, Mrs. Harriet Bennett was severely burned about the face and body through her clothes catching fire. She was taken to St. Vincent's Hospital. It is believed that she inhaled the flames. Her condition is very serious.

headline.main: WOMAN SEVERELY BURNED.; Efforts of Husband and Grandchild to Save Mrs. Bennett.

docs.snippet: The Municipal Art Society has issued the report of its City Plan Committee on needed transit changes for New York. After criticising some of Chief Engineer Parsons's suggestions to the Rapid Transit Commission, and discussing the general policy th...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Municipal Art Society has issued the report of its City Plan Committee on needed transit changes for New York. After criticising some of Chief Engineer Parsons's suggestions to the Rapid Transit Commission, and discussing the general policy that it considers proper for the city authorities to pursue, the committee outlines its own plans for alleviating the traffic conditions, manifested within the east few years.

headline.main: NEW SUBWAY PLANS OF MUNICIPAL ART SOCIETY; Comprehensive System Uniting All Boroughs Is Recommended. Should Be Under City Control, with Uni- versal Transfer -- Crosstown Routes and Deeper Tunnels for Express Service.

docs.snippet: The demand for American apples in Great Britain and other parts of Europe has been very large, and the exports during the past year were 1,217,767 barrels. They exceeded the exports of the previous year by 461,355 barrels. By far the greater part ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The demand for American apples in Great Britain and other parts of Europe has been very large, and the exports during the past year were 1,217,767 barrels. They exceeded the exports of the previous year by 461,355 barrels. By far the greater part went to Great Britain, only 24,521 barrels having gone to Hamburg, and 58,710 to other European countries.

headline.main: OUTLOOK FOR APPLE CROP.; Big Demand in Europe for American Fruit -- Lower Prices Expected.

docs.snippet: THE reputation of opening-night audiences in the theatre being what it is, it is quite possible that the presumably well-behaved majority at the opening on Dec. 7 of Jack Gelber's new play, "The Apple," at the Living Theatre, will be no more than ...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE reputation of opening-night audiences in the theatre being what it is, it is quite possible that the presumably well-behaved majority at the opening on Dec. 7 of Jack Gelber's new play, "The Apple," at the Living Theatre, will be no more than routinely annoyed at the antics of one of the crowd in the lobby.
docs.abstract: Apple, The, by J Gelber: Gelber int

headline.main: GELBER'S 'APPLE'; Playwright Experiments With Free Form Style of Drama Again
